founders.description:
Aspiring astronaut and ML enthusiast.
Preparing the world for AGI @Andon Labs.
Happy to chat about all things startups, alignment, robotics, and space!

raw_markdown="[![Andon Logo](https://andonlabs.com/images/logo.svg)](https://andonlabs.com/</>) Datasets [![External link](https://andonlabs.com/images/icons/arrow-up-right.svg) Safety evals](https://andonlabs.com/<https:/evals.andonlabs.com>)[Blog](https://andonlabs.com/</blog>)
# Preparing the world for AGI
We help frontier AI labs evaluate their models, ensuring a safe transition to the post-AGI world.
## Custom evaluations to understand the true capabilities of models
### Agentic evaluations
Our digital environments evaluate the capabilities of AI agents to act autonomously, perform automated AI research, and gather resources over long time horizons.
### Synthetic datasets
Our pipelines generate custom datasets for both evaluating and training models on specific capabilities.
![Anthropic logo](https://andonlabs.com/images/anthropic_logo_white.svg)
## Trusted by the world's leading AI labs
Our agentic evaluations help Anthropic ensure the safety of their Claude models before deployment.
## Get in touch
Interested in what we do? Contact us at founders (at) andonlabs.com, or reach to us on our socials.
![Lukas Petersson](https://andonlabs.com/images/lukas.jpeg) Lukas Petersson

generated_description:
**Andon Labs Overview**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Andon Labs is on an ambitious mission: preparing the world for Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). With a sleek website at [andonlabs.com](https://andonlabs.com/), this budding company is located in the tech space yet to be detailed, and operates with a compact team of just two employees.

**What Does Andon Labs Do?**

Andon Labs specializes in helping advanced AI labs evaluate their models. As we inch closer to AGI, the need for effective evaluation methods is paramount. They’re focused on ensuring a safe transition into what many see as a pivotal era in tech.

1. **Custom Evaluations**: They offer tailored evaluations to understand the true capabilities of AI models. This includes:
   - **Agentic Evaluations**: These are digital environments that assess AI agents’ abilities to operate autonomously, conduct AI research, and manage resources effectively over extended periods.
   - **Synthetic Datasets**: Andon Labs generates custom datasets designed for training and evaluating AI on specific capabilities.

2. **Trusted Partners**: Their evaluations make a difference—leading AI labs like Anthropic turn to Andon Labs to evaluate the safety of their Claude models before they hit the market.

**Meet the Team**

The company’s small team consists of Lukas Petersson and Axel Backlund, both of whom seem to be driving innovation in this critical field. They are backed by Diana Hu as their Group Partner at Y Combinator, which adds a solid layer of credibility to their operations.

**Get in Touch**

For those intrigued by their work or looking for collaborations, Andon Labs invites you to connect via their website or through social media. 

In a world racing toward AGI, Andon Labs is positioning itself as a key player in ensuring that the journey is both productive and safe. As startups in this space arise, they’ll be one to keep an eye on. 

For more insights, visit [andonlabs.com](https://andonlabs.com/) and explore their offerings—who knows, they might be the partner you didn't know you needed in your AI endeavors.
